price: 41. Kuwa rumeyn diida Waanada14 (Qur’aanka) markuu u yimid (waa laga jazayn)15 oo (kani Qur’aanka) waa Kitaab sharaf weyn leh.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِٱلذِّكۡرِ لَمَّا جَآءَهُمۡۖ وَإِنَّهُۥ لَكِتَٰبٌ عَزِيزٞ
footnotes: 14. Kuwa diida xaqa ama door bida tafsiirka qalloocan Alle ma hanuuniyo. 15. Hadalka inta ka go’an waa la iska garan karaa oo waxaa weeye: Waxay la kulmi doonaan ciqaab aan la suureysan karin.”

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna kafarū bil-dhik'ri lammā jāahum wa-innahu lakitābun ʿazīzun
